title: Malco MC12ARB Replacement Blades, Mc12A
features: M12A for pattern, straight shearing, mild curve cuts, and multiple layers of material.
MC12A for combination cuts left or right and straight cuts.
Also offered in regular style handles.
description: Sleek styling, easy blade replacement, and original style handles make Malco’s 14″ Andy Classic snips the perfect addition to any tool bag. These snips are ideal for cutting vinyl siding, aluminum, copper, or sheet metal. The sleek head design improves maneuverability making it easier to cut materials such as J-Channel. A full 3″ (76.2 mm) cutting length makes straight shearing with the Malco Andy™ Snip fast and easy. Pressure-fit inset blades make replacement easy while out in the field.
Replacement blade for the MC12A Andy Classic 12" Combination Snip.
